trans-unit.source: Username for Service BW API: The username to get a token for further API requests. Normally starts with ws_.
trans-unit.target: Username for Service BW API: The username to get a token for further API requests. Normally starts with ws_.

trans-unit.source: Password for Service BW API: Password to receive a token, which will be used for further API requests.
trans-unit.target: Password for Service BW API: Password to receive a token, which will be used for further API requests.

trans-unit.source: Mandant: Place the number of the mandant of the city (only BW).
trans-unit.target: Mandant: Place the number of the mandant of the city (only BW).

trans-unit.source: URI of Service BW API: To which URI the API requests should be send?. Normally: https://sgw.service-bw.de:443/
trans-unit.target: URI of Service BW API: To which URI the API requests should be send?. Normally: https://sgw.service-bw.de:443/

trans-unit.source: Allowed languages: Define multiple allowed languages. Format: [2 letters language ISO code]=0. Assign multiple languages with ";". Example: de=0;en=0. First value will be used as default language. The zero is present for compatibility reasons.
trans-unit.target: Allowed languages: Define multiple allowed languages. Format: [2 letters language ISO code]=0. Assign multiple languages with ";". Example: de=0;en=0. First value will be used as default language. The zero is present for compatibility reasons.

trans-unit.source: Description from Service BW API - Die IDs der Gebiete, in deren Kontext man diese Operation ausführen möchte.:Optional parameter for API requests. Leave empty to not use this filter option.
trans-unit.target: Description from Service BW API - Die IDs der Gebiete, in deren Kontext man diese Operation ausführen möchte.:Optional parameter for API requests. Leave empty to not use this filter option.

trans-unit.source: Description from Service BW API - Die amtlichen Gemeindeschlüssel, in deren Kontext man diese Operation ausführen möchte.:Optional parameter for API requests. Leave empty to not use this filter option.
trans-unit.target: Description from Service BW API - Die amtlichen Gemeindeschlüssel, in deren Kontext man diese Operation ausführen möchte.:Optional parameter for API requests. Leave empty to not use this filter option.
